data.name: Jumps VR Demo
data.detailed_description:
Jumps VR is a fast paced first person platformer, where you have a limited amount of jumps to complete each level. Keep collecting jump tokens and powerups to make it through to the end. Each world introduces exciting new game mechanics to figure out and master, including trampolines, cannons, rocket jumping and more!

Jumps VR builds upon the original game, Jumps, now with full motion controls and fast-paced VR platforming.
data.about_the_game:
Jumps VR is a fast paced first person platformer, where you have a limited amount of jumps to complete each level. Keep collecting jump tokens and powerups to make it through to the end. Each world introduces exciting new game mechanics to figure out and master, including trampolines, cannons, rocket jumping and more!

Jumps VR builds upon the original game, Jumps, now with full motion controls and fast-paced VR platforming.
data.short_description: Enter a world of sky islands and jump your way to the finish, now in absurdly fast VR!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
